title: 'Fintech platforms are agile, but increase risk of misuse'
description: RBI deputy governor Swaminathan J discussed the rise of 'agile' fintech platforms at the Global Money Week 2024 in Paris, emphasizing the need for robust regulatory frameworks, cybersecurity measures, and consumer awareness to mitigate fraud risks.
